jobDescription: Role Name: Data AnalystLocation: San Francisco, CADuration: 12-18 Months We're looking for local candidates with 5+ years of Data Analysis and some banking/mortgage experience Job Details:Bachelor's degree in Mathematics, Statistics, MIS or equivalent5+ years in an analytic role related to credit risk or portfolio management.Strong with SAS and UNIX and Shell Scripts environment.Strong at MS SQL Server relational database extraction/manipulation/summarization skills required.Strong analytical and statistical analysis capabilities.Strong problem solving and project management skills requiredStrong PC software applications proficiency.MS Office Suite.Preferred Skills3 years mortgage industry experience.Knowledge of ACL and CCAR process.
